story.title: Shadows of the Vanished Star
story.author: Daphne Sawyer
story.description: When a tech heiress vanishes and only a cryptic ornament remains, private detective Sam Mercer is drawn into a labyrinth of rain-soaked alleys, secret libraries and shadowed docks. Every clue raises new questions and every decision pulls him deeper into a conspiracy that reaches the city\

nodes.title: Midnight Client
nodes.narration: The rain beats against your office window as you stare at the blinking neon outside. A shadow crosses the threshold and a woman in a soaked trench coat steps in, her eyes pleading as she produces a star‑shaped ornament and whispers about a missing heiress. The scent of damp pavement and old paper fills the room as you weigh the danger in her words. The city hums with secrets and you sense this is only the beginning.

choices.text: Take the case and head to the crime scene
choices.description: Duty calls, even in the rain.

choices.text: Decline and watch from your window

nodes.title: Reluctant Watch
nodes.narration: You send the woman away but curiosity gnaws at you. Through the rain‑streaked glass you spot a figure lurking across the street, camera in hand, snapping shots of your office. The alley glistens under streetlights, the city breathing like a beast. You can either plunge into the rain after him or keep your distance.

choices.text: Follow the shadow down the street
Stay in the shadows and watch

nodes.title: Nervous Witness
nodes.narration: A jittery bystander leans against a rain‑speckled window, phone pressed to their ear. Eyes darting, they clutch their coat tighter as you approach. The hum of the city seems to fade as you decide whether to coax the truth out gently or grease the wheels with cash.

choices.text: Slip them some money for answers

nodes.title: Watching in the Rain
nodes.narration: You blend into the downpour, letting the suspect lead you through alleys washed in neon. Each puddle reflects a fractured world. From beneath your coat you feel the weight of your own tech; a laptop hums faintly, begging to breach encrypted messages. Do you tap into their communications or continue to tail them in person?

choices.description: Digital secrets are often the juiciest.

nodes.title: Message in Red
nodes.narration: Inside the envelope you find a photograph of a star‑shaped pendant and a coded message written in red ink. The paper feels slick under your wet fingers. The symbols hint at library catalogues and old secrets. You must decide where to unravel it.

nodes.title: Forensic Report
nodes.narration: Back in your own lab, flickering monitors illuminate your face. You scan the envelope for prints and analyze the ink under glaring light. A fingerprint matches an underworld fixer, and a GPS tag points toward the docks. You can pursue the data trail or act on the intel.

choices.text: Head to the docks to track them

nodes.title: Warehouse Intel
nodes.narration: Your efforts pay off: a whispered confession or hacked message reveals a rendezvous at an abandoned warehouse tagged with graffiti. The building looms like a dark monument against the skyline. You can burst in and risk everything or take time to plan.

choices.description: A cautious approach may pay off.

nodes.title: Last Train Out
nodes.narration: The suspect slips onto a midnight train and you hurry to the yard, steam hissing from dormant engines. Darkness cloaks the tracks as the last call echoes through loudspeakers. You can board the train now or try to outsmart them at the next stop.

nodes.title: Stacks of Secrets
nodes.narration: Dust motes dance in shafts of light as you wander endless stacks of books. The smell of old paper surrounds you. You trace obscure catalog numbers until your fingers land on a tome describing a star ornament that unlocks secrets in bank vaults. Do you test the key or dig deeper into the archives?

choices.text: Go to the bank with the ornament
choices.description: The vault may hold the truth.
There might be more to uncover.

nodes.title: Dockside Shadows
nodes.narration: The smell of salt and diesel hangs heavy as you creep between crates at the docks. A lone boat rocks gently against weathered pilings, voices murmuring above the splash of waves. Do you remain hidden to gather evidence or step into the light to confront the gang leader?

nodes.title: Rooftop Showdown
nodes.narration: Wind whips across the rooftop as you corner the suspect against a backdrop of towering skyscrapers, their windows glittering like stars. Sweat beads under your collar despite the cold. With nowhere left to run, your quarry eyes the gap between buildings. Your next move will decide both your fates.

choices.description: Use force to end the chase.

nodes.title: Station Ambush
nodes.narration: The train pulls away and you find yourself in a deserted station corridor, fluorescent lights flickering overhead. Footsteps echo in the distance, then vanish. Your target has slipped into the darkness. Do you wait for them to double back or call in a contact who owes you a favor?

nodes.title: Midnight Pier
nodes.narration: Moonlight paints the pier silver as waves lap against its weathered boards. A lone figure waits beneath a lamp, face hidden beneath a hood. They offer you a choice – join them and share in the profits of the conspiracy, or refuse and expose the whole operation. Trust and betrayal hang in the salty air.

nodes.title: Breaking In
nodes.narration: With allies at your side, you push open a door into a long, dim hallway. Footsteps echo as you approach a meeting in progress, voices low and conspiratorial. Do you storm in and make arrests or stay back to record the exchange for the world to see?

nodes.title: Case Slips Away
nodes.narration: You charge into the fray and the gang scatters like shadows in rain. A shot rings out, a boat engine roars, and the mastermind vanishes into the night. Weeks later you stare at your cork board, threads of yarn connecting photos that lead nowhere. The case goes cold and the city forgets, but you cannot.

nodes.title: Deal with the Devil
nodes.narration: Temptation wins. You pocket the files and step into the inner circle. The ladder you climb may be gilded, but every rung is slick with guilt. Wealth and connections flow your way, yet in quiet moments you wonder what became of the young woman whose ornament unlocked your fortune.

nodes.title: Whistleblower
nodes.narration: You choose exposure over safety. Hidden behind glowing monitors, you compile recordings and documents and leak them to the press. Headlines explode, powerful figures fall, and the city convulses. You become both hero and target, vanishing into digital shadows while knowing you did the right thing.
